description:
Job Title: Senior Manager, Business Development

Reports to: Director, Marketplace

Job Location: Los Angeles, CA, USA

Job Status: Exempt


About SHEIN

SHEIN is a global online fashion and lifestyle retailer, offering SHEIN branded apparel and products from global network of vendors, all at affordable prices. Headquartered in Singapore, SHEIN remains committed to making the beauty of fashion accessible to all, promoting its industry-leading, on demand production methodology, for a smarter, future-ready industry. Founded in 2012, SHEIN has more than 16,000 employees operating from offices around the world, and continues to expand operations globally. Join SHEIN and be the future!


Position Summary

This role as a Senior Manager, Business Development for Marketplace will drive the goal for marketplace growth. This role will be responsible from recruit key accounts and start to finish for onboarding all new vendors. You will also strategize on everything that can boost marketplace sales and build vendor relationships, resulting in creating top-selling assortments.


Job Responsibilities

  • Business Development: Identify and pursue new business opportunities for SHEIN Marketplace. Develop and implement strategies to increase the number of sellers on the SHEIN Marketplace. Meet KPIs for marketplace vendor recruitment and marketplace sales.
  • Relationship Building: Build and maintain relationships with sellers who are interested in selling on the SHEIN Marketplace.
  • Sales Growth: Drive growth for SHEIN Marketplace sellers through developing new product opportunities, creating targeted marketing campaigns, and optimizing product listings.
  • Cross-functional Collaboration: Work cross-functionally with internal teams such as product, marketing, and finance to ensure sellers are successful in the Marketplace. Collaborate with teams to identify and implement strategies to increase seller performance and grow sales.
  • Develop Team: Build a marketplace business development team and create from scratch all SOP for the team.


Job Requirements

  • Highly motivated, results-driven.
  • 5+ years of business development experience, preferably in e-commerce.
  • Bachelor's Degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field is preferred.
  • 3+ years managing a team in a sales environment.
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
  • Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment.


Pay

$107,600 - 180,200 + bonus


Benefits and Perks

  • Healthcare (medical, dental, vision, prescription drugs)
  • Health Savings Account with Employer Funding
  • Flexible Spending Accounts (Healthcare and Dependent care)
  • Company-Paid Basic Life/AD&D insurance
  • Company-Paid Short-Term and Long-Term Disability
  • Voluntary Benefit Offerings (Voluntary Life/AD&D, Hospital Indemnity, Critical Illness, and Accident)
  • Employee Assistance Program
  • Business Travel Accident Insurance
  • 401(k) Savings Plan with discretionary company match and access to a financial advisor
  • Vacation, paid holidays, floating holiday and sick days
  • Employee discounts
  • Free weekly catered lunch
  • Dog-friendly office (available at select locations)
  • Free gym access (available at select locations)
  • Free swag giveaways
  • Annual Holiday Party
  • Invitations to pop-ups and other company events
  • Complimentary daily office snacks and beverages


SHEIN Distribution is an equal opportunity employer committed to a diverse workplace environment.
